          <title>
            <string language="en">The planet Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Planet Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La planète Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O planeta Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il pianeta Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο πλανήτης Αφροδίτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El planeta Venus</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how the planet Venus looks like through a telescope at different positions in its orbit around the Sun.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planetary motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">telescope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Venus</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie der Planet Venus wie 
durch ein Teleskop in unterschiedlichen Positionen in seiner Bahn um 
die Sonne aussieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment la planète Venus 
ressemble à par un télescope différentes positions dans son orbite 
autour du soleil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como o planeta Venus olha 
como através de um telescópio em posições diferentes em sua 
órbita em torno do sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come il pianeta Venus 
assomiglia tramite ad un telescopio le posizioni differenti nella 
relativa orbita intorno al sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς ο πλανήτης 
Αφροδίτη μοιάζει με μέσω ενός τηλεσκοπίου στις διαφορετικές 
θέσεις στην τροχιά του γύρω από τον ήλιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo el planeta Venus 
parece a través de un telescopio diversas posiciones en su órbita 
alrededor del sol.</string>
          </description>
